mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket_detail (name, sum, price, sum_price, pay_statue, update_time, order_id, user_email, conference_name) VALUES (#{name}, #{sum}, #{price}, #{sumPrice}, #{payStatue}, #{updateTime}, #{orderId}, #{userEmail}, #{conferenceName});
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, sum, price, sum_price AS sumPrice, update_time AS updateTime, order_id AS orderId, user_email AS userEmail, conference_name AS conferenceName FROM ticket_detail WHERE user_email = #{userEmail} AND pay_statue = 'TRADE_SUCCESS';

SELECT name, price, sum(sum) as sum, sum(sum_price) AS priceSum, conference_name AS conferenceName FROM ticket_detail WHERE conference_name = #{conferenceName} AND pay_statue = 'TRADE_SUCCESS' GROUP BY name;
